deploy.startCommand: echo '[MoA] pwd:' $(pwd) && echo '[MoA] node:' $(node -v) && echo '[MoA] tsx:' $(./node_modules/.bin/tsx --version 2>&1 || echo 'NOT FOUND') && echo '[MoA] server.ts exists:' $(test -f extensions/kakao/server.ts && echo YES || echo NO) && echo '[MoA] Starting server...' && exec ./node_modules/.bin/tsx extensions/kakao/server.ts
